sentences.en: A network of railways has spread over the province.
All that digging had left a network of abandoned mines and tunnels.
sentences.cn: 东挖西掘后留下了一片废弃的矿坑。

sentences.en: an intricate network of loyalties and relationships
sentences.cn: 忠诚与义气构成的盘根错节的网络

sentences.en: ISDN connectivity allows computers to communicate over a network.
sentences.cn: 综合业务数字网连接实现了计算机网络通讯。

sentences.en: It is generally appreciated that the rail network needs a complete overhaul.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,铁路系统需要大检修.

sentences.en: The fabrics are merchandised through a network of dealers.
sentences.cn: 通过经销网点销售纺织品.

sentences.en: The majority obtained their positions through the old boy network.
sentences.cn: 大多数人都是通过校友关系谋得其职位的。

sentences.en: the network of blood vessels in the body
The network took it off the air in 1971.
The network will provide the gamut of computer services to your home.
sentences.cn: 这个网络将为家庭提供全方位的计算机服务。

sentences.en: The ultimate aim is to expand the network further.
sentences.cn: 最终目的是为了进一步拓展该网络。

sentences.en: They follow minutely the news from abroad on Cable News Network.
sentences.cn: 他们密切追踪有线电视新闻网上的国外新闻。

sentences.en: They have built the national network.
sentences.cn: 他们建成了全国性的网络.

sentences.en: They were unable to run the telephone network economically.
sentences.cn: 他们未能经济地经营电话网络.

sentences.en: Try browsing around in the network bulletin boards.
sentences.cn: 试着在网络论坛上浏览信息。

sentences.en: We threaded through a network of back streets.
sentences.cn: 我们在蜘蛛网似的偏僻街道中七拐八拐地穿行。

sentences.en: You’re listening to the American Armed Forces Network.
sentences.cn: 您正在收听的是美军广播电台。

网络安全；网络安全性；网络保密
网络系统；网状制；网络系统供电网系统

trans.tran_cn: 网络，网状物，网状系统，广播网
trans.tran_en: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other
